text:
Hi there! I have a question about custom objects and associations:

I have one custom object "Recommendation Set" that will have dynamic pages per record. Each "Set" will contain 2-4 "Programs" - another custom object. I am trying to display the associated Programs for a Set using <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#crm-associations|crm_associations> but I cannot for the life of me find where the 'association type id' for 2 custom objects that is required. Any thoughts / ideas / suggestions?
Does anyone have a solution for this?
Escape jinjava will solve this issue
make a `GET` request to `crm/v3/schemas/{objectType}`  where object type is custom object type, i.e. 2-3465404

Hey everyone, I'm hoping this is a simple fix, but is there a way to display a title at the top of the blog index template that shows the filter title (based upon tag). E.g. if I am viewing /blog I want the title to be "Blog", but if I'm viewing "/blog/tag/events" I want the title to be "Events".

I've already built a custom blog_listing module - I just need to get the correct title at the top.

hey yall, I wanted to know if anyone knows why my hubl text on html isn't appearing properly with correct color to indicate it understands it's a valid form of code as shown in the snippet below. This is in VS code.

Hi Guys,. anyone here knows where I can read some docs on how to "display dynamic set of deals using the associated deals from the contact logged in" , please :pray:

Right now I have default code of dynamic_page_crm_object_type_fqn.  But im displaying all the deals I want to display the associated deals from person's whos logged in, im using (membership portal)

```{% if dynamic_page_crm_object_type_fqn %}{# dynamic listing page #} 

    {% set deal = crm_objects(dynamic_page_crm_object_type_fqn,  "pipeline=default&limit=200","hs_object_id, amount, dealname, HubSpot_owner_id, dealstage, createdate, closedate, company, hs_all_collaborator_owner_ids") %}```
